select iont.*, (select transport_type_name from transport_type tt where tt.id=iont.transport_type_id) transport_type_name, ion.order_number,ion.remark internalOrderNumberRemark, case when exists(select 1 from fba_packing_list_shop_sku fplss where fplss.fba_shipment_id=iont.fba_shipment_id_short) then 1 else 0 end existFbaShipmentIdShort from internal_order_number_transport iont left JOIN internal_order_number ion on ion.id=iont.internal_order_number_id
and iont.sub_order_number like concat('%',#{orderNumber},'%')
and iont.sub_order_number like concat('%',#{subOrderNumber},'%')
and iont.fba_shipment_id like concat('%',#{fbaShipmentId},'%')
and iont.transfer_order_no like concat('%',#{transferOrderNo},'%')
and iont.transport_type_id= #{transportTypeId} and iont.create_time>= #{createTimeStart} and iont.create_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{createTimeEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and exists(select 1 from fba_packing_list_shop_sku fplss where fplss.fba_shipment_id=iont.fba_shipment_id_short)
and not exists(select 1 from fba_packing_list_shop_sku fplss where fplss.fba_shipment_id=iont.fba_shipment_id_short)
and iont.lock_head_trip_cost_rate = #{lockHeadTripCostRate}
order by ion.order_number desc,iont.sub_order_number asc

select count(0) from`fba_packing_list` fpl,`internal_order_number_transport` iont where fpl.`shop_id`=#{shopId} and iont.`shipment_id` = fpl.`shipment_id` and iont.`create_time`>=#{month} and iont.`create_time`<date_add(#{month}, interval 1 MONTH) and head_trip_cost_rate is null
mapper.update: update `fba_packing_list` fpl,`internal_order_number_transport` iont set iont.lock_head_trip_cost_rate=1 where fpl.`shop_id`=#{shopId} and iont.`shipment_id` = fpl.`shipment_id` and iont.`create_time`>=#{month} and iont.`create_time`<date_add(#{month}, interval 1 MONTH) and head_trip_cost_rate is not null
